properties.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet/Northwest Weld County
properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 1 at 11:28AM MST until January 1 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph.

* WHERE...Larimer County Below 6000 Feet/Northwest Weld County.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile
vehicles. At this time, Interstate 25 and Highway 85 are closed
due to hazardous travel conditions.
properties.instruction:
Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving
conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk
for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile
vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured
properly.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
